tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Dharmesh Khatri is very humble and cultured. Although it was my first visit to him, he made me comfortable, listened to my problems and then suggested me few medicines and an X- ray.

I am sure that would it had been any other doc, he would have straight away told me for MRI. bur Dr.Khatri said that if required we will go for MRI or else we will try to treat with medicines only. Very few doctors are like that. 

Thanks Practo also wherein I could get all the information about doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
** ** *** ** ****** ****** ** **** **** **** 
He treats patient very well and brings patient in comfort zone. 
He so caring, friendly and explains everything in detail and clarifies all doubts. 
We approached him for knee surgery which was successfully done by him. He also treated very well after surgery and always explained our query in detail

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: From diagnosis to post operation follow up. We never felt we are in hospital.  We were so comfortable.  And everything was so smooth. We were guided and taken care of from time to time. Really good experience.

review: ***** *** *** **** ********** ****** ** ********** ********* ******* ** ** ******* Your talent, professional skills and caring attitude is a big credit to the medical profession. You are truly a life saver. A big thank you to you again.....

review: *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** ******* Doctor is soft spoken and listen to the patient with full patience. Highly experienced and qualified.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: He is a an efficient and very good natured doc and gives well considered advice honestly I feel no hesitation in recommending him

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My mother's knee replacement surgery has done by Dr Dharmesh. We have very good results, she has relived from knee pain and have active lifestyle.He explained everything in a clear manner. He is very friendly, helpful *** ************** I highly recommended him anyone looking for specialist.
